attributes.action: women suffering physical, mental and emotional abuse from in-laws.
attributes.additional_details: Recently Amir khans wife The WBC World Middleweight Champion's wife said that her in-laws, both mother and sister of the famous Pakistani boxer who represents England and Pakistan. Faryal Makhdoom, a human rights activist as well as an occasional ramp walker, has exposed her in-laws and their bellicose behavior that she had been facing. And this is the case of many. Faryal Makhdoom spoke out against abusive in laws, it's a reality for most women especially those from minority ethnic culture.
attributes.background: women have become an object to be abused by In-laws due to being married. They are told that they have no rights constantly and controlled by the husbands family. It's a shame that we live in Britain a country that give freedom of speech yet this is happening.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
